simulate protein level data with two groups

Source: R/simulate_LFQ_data.R
sim_lfq_data.Rd

simulate protein level data with two groups

sim_lfq_data(
  Nprot = 20,
  N = 4,
  fc = list(A = c(D = -2, U = 2, N = 0), B = c(D = 1, U = -4)),
  prop = list(A = c(D = 10, U = 10), B = c(D = 5, U = 20)),
  mean_prot = 20,
  sdlog = log(1.2),
  probability_of_success = 0.3,
  PEPTIDE = FALSE
)

Arguments

Nprot

number of porteins

N

group size

fc

D - down regulation N - matrix, U - regulation

prop

proportion of down (D), up (U) and not regulated (N)

Examples


sim_lfq_data(Nprot = 10)
#> # A tibble: 120 × 11
#>    proteinID idtype2 nr_peptides average_prot_abundance    sd sample group  mean
#>    <chr>     <chr>         <dbl>                  <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr> <dbl>
#>  1 CpNtt1    3384              5                   25.5     1 Ctrl_… Ctrl      0
#>  2 CpNtt1    3384              5                   25.5     1 Ctrl_… Ctrl      0
#>  3 CpNtt1    3384              5                   25.5     1 Ctrl_… Ctrl      0
#>  4 CpNtt1    3384              5                   25.5     1 Ctrl_… Ctrl      0
#>  5 CpNtt1    3384              5                   27.5     1 A_V1   A        -2
#>  6 CpNtt1    3384              5                   27.5     1 A_V2   A        -2
#>  7 CpNtt1    3384              5                   27.5     1 A_V3   A        -2
#>  8 CpNtt1    3384              5                   27.5     1 A_V4   A        -2
#>  9 CpNtt1    3384              5                   24.5     1 B_V1   B         1
#> 10 CpNtt1    3384              5                   24.5     1 B_V2   B         1
#> # ℹ 110 more rows
#> # ℹ 3 more variables: N <dbl>, Replicate <chr>, abundance <dbl>
res <- sim_lfq_data(Nprot = 10, PEPTIDE = TRUE)
